system.description: Small centaurs from the Southern Isles. They are thought to be a long lost centaur tribe that split off before the 1st age.
system.appearance: As a centaur but much smaller.

overview.base: Harsh conditions or long exertions do not easily tire you. You have advantage on all saves or checks made to against exhaustion, running out of breath, starvation, thirst, heat, and cold.
You swim at full speed.
